titles.title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate a high priority corridor in California.
To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate a high priority corridor in California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

bill.summary: Amends the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate I-710 in California between the terminus at Long Beach to State Route 60 as a high priority corridor on the National Highway System.
